name: World of Warships: Legends — Heavy Hitter
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Heavy Hitter
description:
Set sail playing a German large destroyer with weaponry that punches well above her weight class! Z-39 carries heavy armament comprising torpedoes and cruiser-size guns, and also has plenty of HP for brawls out on the high seas!

This bundle includes: - Tier VI destroyer Z-39 - 5x Promotion Orders - 15x Rare Battle Boosters - Bonus: 37,000 Commander XP

If you already have Z-39, you will receive the following as compensation:

- 12,500 doubloons

Some content, including Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
